input.sentences: driving over to the fundraiser through a tunnel .
at the fundraiser there are a lot of activities for people to do .
there are wooden stations set up .
there are games and platforms arranged for participants .
it was nighttime during the fundraiser .
output.sentences: I know we're late, but you better watch your speed.
Look, the competition has already started.
What the heck kind of competition is this, anyway?
I don't know, but it has something to do with beanbags.
